text: The Santiago de Cuba International Airport (Antonio Maceo Airport) is the second most-important airport of the Island of Cuba. It is in the Santiago de Cuba Province, in the municipality of Santiago de Cuba. The airport has around 2.8 million passengers yearly. It is hub for Cubana de Aviacion airlines. It serves the municipalities of Santiago, Palma Soriano, Contramaestre and the other 6 municipalities of the province. Category:Buildings and structures in Cuba Category:Airports in North America Category:Oriente
title: Santiago de Cuba International Airport
